Title: Once Upon a Time in Mumbai
Writer: Rajat Arora, Bhrigu Brinda (story screenplay and dialogue), Aditi Mediratta (associate writer)
Actors: Ajay Devgn, Emraan Hashmi, Kangana Ranaut, Prachi Desai
Plot: A smuggler rises to power in in 1970s Mumbai, a younger gangster seeks to overthrow him, and a police officer is caught in the middle.
